_sText:
Bhop_FL
~~~~~~~
By Frozer Laxegon @ frozeraism.blogspot.com
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description :
Bhop map with 5 levels, 4 sections for each level, includes a mini long jump.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Features :
~Big and wide spawn
~Mini long jump
~5 levels with 4 sections on each level
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Cvars :
sv_airaccelerate 1200
sv_enablebunnyhopping 1
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Misc. Info :
Softwares used : Hammer Editor[Source SDK]
Mapping time : 1 hour 15 mins[10 mins for layout, 15 mins for ideas, 30 mins for adding challenges, 20 mins for final touchup]
Custom textures : None used
Skybox : militia_hdr
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
How To Install :
[1]Extract archive using Winrar
[2]Drag and put bhop_fl.bsp into ./Steam/steamapps/<yoursteamusername>/Counter-Strike:Source/cstrike/maps
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits :
Frozer - Map Author
Tranquility - Beta Tester
Manfred - Beta Tester
MaxsterBoy - Beta Tester
Jialong - Beta Tester
Resonance - Beta Tester

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
